body_html:
@drpngx Loot at here. https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r0.12/tensorflow/python/ops/embedding_ops.py#L109
This issue is that ids may be out of the range of params[0].
So I want to judge the each of the ids value.
Do you have any better idea?

body:
@drpngx Loot at here. https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r0.12/tensorflow/python/ops/embedding_ops.py#L109
This issue is that `ids` may be out of the range of `params[0]`.
So I want to judge the each of the `ids` value.
Do you have any better idea?
